go_data.justification: A PGC-1alpha isoform induced by resistance training regulates skeletal muscle hypertrophy
PGC-1alpha4 expression was found to be increased in response to exercise
overexpression of a splice variant of PGC-1alpha, PGC-1alpha4, may induce muscle fiber hypertrophy through the downregulation of myostatin expression
overexpression of a splice variant of PGC-1alpha, PGC-1alpha4, may induce muscle fiber hypertrophy through... increase in IGF-1 expression
